author: Francisco Rodrigues
title: The Blockchain Group Starts 300M-Euro ATM Share Sale to Expand Bitcoin Holdings
description: The program allows French asset manager TOBAM to buy shares at its discretion, potentially increasing its shareholding to as much as 39%. It currently holds 3%.
content:
The Blockchain Group (ALTBG), a tech firm that brands itself as Europes first Bitcoin Treasury Company, announced a share-issuance program worth up to 300 million euros ($342.5 million).
The capital… [+1404 chars]
